Body.Content:
We are announcing new features for the Dynamics 365 expense management mobile app for Dynamics 365 Project Operations. These features will reach general availability on November 14, 2025.

How does this affect me?
The app now displays icons next to each expense category for faster selection and allows users to rename receipts directly in the app, making attachments easier to manage.

What action do I need to take?
This message is for awareness, and no action is required.

Title: Dynamics 365 Project Operations â€“ Dynamics 365 expense management mobile app new features
